documents.document: Mightily Impressed by Michelle O'Neill. #todaysor
Give it up Sean. You're making yourself look foolish. #todaysor
Shockingly bad interviewing by Sean O'Rourke. Michelle O'Neill well able to put him in his place. #todaysor
Is this the Fine Gael Kate O'Connell who appointed her sister as her assistant on €49,000pa 3 weeks after being elected? #cblive
#medicationnation This is me getting Solpadeine. https://t.co/pQg06Udh6w
@GreenClouds4 @Dizzydub1 Probably sent you on that career path! Is there nothing it can't do!
@lostjimmy Saturday bath and a huge spoon of Magnesia after. Good times!
@GreenClouds4 @Dizzydub1 It never did me any harm though...*twitches violently*
@GreenClouds4 @Dizzydub1 Straight through ya it went!
@Dizzydub1 I went to school smelling of Milk of Magnesia and nit powder!
I was force fed spoons of Milk of Magnesia as a child. Oh the chalky Humanity! #medicationnation
We're all hopped up on goofballs. It's the weather and the government n' all. #medicationnation
@itchybollix Future captains of industry..and perverted politicians.
@itchybollix Yeah, but could they put an IKEA flat pack together..I fucking doubt it!
Somebody hired Van to injure Hobbs' arm. A case of Hurts Van Rental...*gets coat and leaves* #UniversityChallenge
Hobbs is using the old "answers written on the cast" ploy. #UniversityChallenge
I'm stocking up on solpadeines before this airs tonight. #medicationnation
If Silver Dream Racer was on..I would probably watch it.
@HRHgearoid Well Earned!
Sunday Pints Time.
@redliz Yes, it's not an easy watch. This week is even grimmer.
Mesmerising stuff from Emily Watson. #AppleTreeYard
Patrick McGoohan Columbo starting on ITV now.
Aww look at Brendan O'Connor shinner bashing again in the Sindo. Maybe someday you could write something worth reading, Brendan.
@xerophyte12345 @realDonaldTrump Image of him!
@_PhilEStine He deserves everything he gets! The man's an unstable lunatic.
My Timeline is an endless stream of anti-Trump sentiment. Fabulous. I'm in the right place.
@The_Robbo They wouldn't last long over here!
Out of my brain on the 5-15. #SkyArts
A million accumulator dockets thrown at the television. #Thistlecrack
@redliz The whole thing is Shambolic!
This main presenter on ITV Racing is painful. Like watching an eel on a hot skillet.
He's spouting rubbish. How are people to afford huge rents when they're pensioners. #LateLateShow
@lizzie_grime We all do it!
@lizzie_grime Sometimes they want you to hear!
@Ger_Stapleton The ads were on during A Fistful of Dynamite!..back there now.
It's like that boring couple in the pub. #LateLateShow
Oh for fucks sakes. #LateLateShow
@Spacebeak I'd say a night out on the town with him would be great. Such a knowledgeable and witty man.
@xerophyte12345 Pure shite. Hope Shearer knocks him to fuck out!
@bigjoe_dub The very one! And a brilliant Rod Steiger.
@starshiphonda I'm trying!!
@foreverantrim Yes!..love that odd little tune.
A Fistful of Dynamite is on #TG4 at 9-20. Watch it. It's Fabulous.
Sexy song sung by Scary men. #bbc4
There's a Furby in the house. We're all demented. I want to fuck it in the fire and hear it screaming.
@bigjoe_dub Fianna Fáil's Michael Martin does a Cringey one too.
@xerophyte12345 Yes..absolutely Dire!
Fuckin cuttin meself. #liveline
@SueKirk It's "funny" Friday. It beggars belief!
Chinese accent jokes. Oh for fucks sakes. #liveline
@cappolil As if..I'll be telling everyone "Look! It's Lil..I told you she was real!!"
@cappolil Oh Lil..someday that'll come through ;)
Pints Time. Time for Pints.
@TaxicabDave I've done the full Jack Nicholson in The Pledge rant!
@TaxicabDave Buckled he was.
@missloulu2 Me too!..its other people that are prejudiced ;)
She looked through the window, seen he was a ginger..and fucked off. #FirstDatesIRL
@TaxicabDave Oh I suspect he's not annoying at all.
Yes, you are an Ass, man. #FirstDatesIRL
@TaxicabDave And like that sober too. Imagine what a feed of drink would do to him. Oh the humanity.
Sweet Jesus. He's a fucking moron. #FirstDatesIRL
@eclecticmick Why I oughta..
Ooo..Theresa May keeps saying "Churchill" and "Special Relationship".
@DecPierce Mother's Milk.
@eclecticmick Sutherland's hippie annoys me!
@eclecticmick I sort of never liked it. Overlong and not enough action. Warmed to it a little bit more recently.
@eclecticmick I only seen it recently! Kelly's Heroes!
@eclecticmick Eek!..I know it's a war film..I can see it!!
@eclecticmick hmm..maybe a bit more cryptic information please.
@eclecticmick Of course you have to buy it. This instant!..before it's gone.
@eclecticmick I hope you bought that fish!
@jamzer1 These people walk among us. Scary.
@eclecticmick How beautiful! Real Clown.
"I heard he crashes cars". Outstanding. #liveline
"Almost" #Apocalypto
@thedailyjaws Hitchcockian.
@TheActualSteve I don't think there's been a better decade in Cinema. So many amazing and diverse films.
@TheActualSteve It's the Crimson fountain that really grabs you!
How did Spielberg get away with that Kintner boy's death scene! Still Astonishing after 40 years. #Jaws
@lostjimmy Larry Vaughn and his fantabulous jackets!
"The Great fish moved silently through the night water" #Jaws
@williamhboney1 Absolutely, great Director. Great at Visceral stuff. I thought Apocalypto was fantastically paced too.
@williamhboney1 Yes, seen that. Gritty.
@williamhboney1 Am going to go along this weekend. He deserves a Big screen!
Apocalypto is on Film4 at 11. Quite simply the best film of the last 30 years.
@davelane They must be shipping listeners. Lots of chopping and changing of presenters.
@rayfo1ey Yes, that oul Today FM DJ name!
@rayfo1ey Both Dire. I listen to The Last Word, that's about it.
Today FM has been going downhill for a long time now. Al Porter certainly won't save it.
@Lusciouslou6 Is there a fuse in the plug? Is the socket working?
@tanglefoot_tony Turn you into a good arm wrestler though.
Odd looking flies are unsettling, aren't they. I always presume they're just waiting for a chance to lay eggs in me.
They should make more films with people throwing a sink through a window.
@gerardsullivan Just send the few bob!
Move the Dail to Borris-In-Ossory. #rtept
Heather Humphreys thinks that if she says "rural Ireland" enough times, people will believe she knows what she's talking about. #rtept
Sure as soon as the towns get prosperous, the Fine Gael and Fianna Fáil Landlords will raise the rent. #rtept
@starshiphonda Don't even go there.
"Supermarket owner and Undertaker". That's REAL rural Ireland! #rtept
